t: Amazon.com: SWAX LAX
s: Swax Lax training balls are the first and only patented soft lacrosse ball that are the same size and weight as a regulation ball. Our ball was developed by a longtime lacrosse coach and has been field tested by boys and girls in Kindergarten through men’s and women’s college lacrosse teams.
